title: magical icon
body: i bought the baron nashor icon and never recieved it, any help?

replies.body: Hey there, you may need to scroll down your icon list a bit to find it.  They're not sorted by when you received it, but it should be there!
They should be sortable by purchase time or name...the second one would need to have the icon name associated with the actual icon (outside the store), maybe as a hover text.
I've tinkered around with this a little bit.  Relog on your client and let me know if it's showing up now.
